principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix academic structure with street-style aesthetics.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel like a high-five.
Content is King: Text is visual. Use typography as image.
Contrast: Hard edges, bold colors, no wishy-washy gradients.

usage_rules: NEVER use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or noise textures.
Primary color is for high-impact accents (buttons, highlights).
Borders are MANDATORY for cards and inputs. Use 2px solid borders.
Shadows should be HARD (no blur): shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)]

grid_system.marketing: Bento Grid (Tetris Mode): grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4
grid_system.dashboard: High Density Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4
grid_system.club_explorer: Masonry-style or uneven grid to break monotony

containers.card: bg-card text-card-foreground border-2 border-border shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_var(--shadow-color)] rounded-xl p-6
containers.button: px-8 py-3 rounded-full font-bold border-2 border-border shadow-[2px_2px_0px_0px_var(--shadow-color)] hover:translate-y-[-2px] hover:shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_var(--shadow-color)] transition-all active:translate-y-[0px] active:shadow-none

specific_components.navbar: Floating pill shape with glassmorphism OR solid border-bottom with marquee.
specific_components.hero: Split screen or large typography overlay on noise texture.
specific_components.quiz_card: Large, clickable cards with icons. Progress bar must be chunky.
specific_components.club_card: Image top, bold title, tags as pill badges. 'Bookmark' button must be prominent.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays (opacity 0.05) to kill digital flatness.
decorations: Marquee text (react-fast-marquee) for announcements or 'Club Compass' branding.
Hand-drawn arrows or scribbles (SVG) to point at CTAs.

setup: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the custom colors and border radius.
Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css'.
implementation_rules: Ensure Dark Mode toggle works and persists.
Implement the 'Neo-Brutalism' shadow style using Tailwind arbitrary values or a custom utility class.
For the Quiz: Make it feel like a game. One question per screen, smooth transitions.
For the Dashboard: Keep it clean but use the bold borders to separate widgets.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' (generic centered layouts, soft gradients).
Use 2-3x more spacing than you think is necessary.
Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Syne'.
